website_summaries.verdict: Accurate and easy even for novice auto or boat mechanics to use, and its onboard printer is a nice plus.
pros: Calibrates and compares well to professional auto mechanics’ battery testers
Onscreen prompts walk users through each test
Includes an integrated printer for a fast, permanent record of battery readings
Helps with electrical diagnostics and in estimating battery life
cons: Leads are not replaceable, and the cables are a little short

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, quick and accurate readings
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed. Not only does it show details about your battery's condition, but it also analyzes your alternator's charging capacity so you can tell if that's working properly. I tested it on my Ferrari and all was well (the battery was <1 year old) and then on my Subaru and it identified that the Subaru's battery was dying (the battery is about 3 years old). I'm glad to have the BST500 as another helpful tool in my garage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but...
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice if spelling (in English) was correct. Testing is spelled “testting” and Model is “modle”. For the cost, I feel they could’ve at least got the spelling correct. Plus it would be nice if you could set the date and forget it and turn off the beep for every button press.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the expensive testers...
customer_reviews.text: I am a heavy equipment Technician. I compared this unit to the 700 dollar tester that our shop has. It does the same tests and it matches the accuracy of the expensive unit we have in our shop. I tested a 720 EN rated battery this morning that failed. Voltage rating and EN reading were within .02 volts of each other and the EN Amp reading was within 2 amps of each other. I am impressed and several techs I work with now want to purchase one for themselves. I especially like that I can put the machine serial number in on the printout tag. Helps with our warranty claims.
customer_reviews.author: Chatz D Rath

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok
customer_reviews.text: It was just ok...the reading was different all the time and printer jammed up as well. It told me that my 2017 Yukon was at 80%, 2015 Wrangler at 70% and the 2007 Ferrari was at 70% as well. I tested a few times and the reading was 20% off. Plus my tinder charger reading was pretty much the Same. I had to return it because I didn’t. See much value in it. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: Alan Bass

customer_reviews.title: This could save me from another Dead Battery
customer_reviews.text: I got this just for my personal use. It seems car batteries are always giving up the ghost. I figured if I checked mine now and then with this tester, it could help me avoid those embarassing moments when your car wont start. I have to say that so far I'm very happy with my purchase. I seems to do a lot of tests, and it prints it out for you. I put together a short video showing me putting this thing through it's first tests. I think that for the money, it's a great deal and a very handy tool to have at home. Heck you can test all your families batteries and maybe save them so grief too.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Purcella, That Kilted Guy DIY

customer_reviews.title: Good price, same features as expensive ones, accurate and precise results.
customer_reviews.text: Pleased. Decent quality. I tested against my mechanics expensive one, it gave a nearly identical CCA number. Good for matching batteries, can see how much life left. Gives internal battery resistance.
customer_reviews.author: homer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Device cannot store date and time so you need to re-enter it EVERY TIME you use this device. The printer does not always work, cables are too short for some applications, annoyingly high pitched LOUD BEEP! every single button press, when trying to set time/date/cca/vin, its just a lot of noise for no reason, only gives a printable good/bad battery report. if the printer worked consistently and this had a 9v battery to store the date and time, I would have rated it 4-5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Burns

customer_reviews.title: The Most for your Money
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to buy something, get something that can do it all. I got an OBD2 plug in from the same company not too long back and it was great. I really like how this will work on any vehicle big (24V) or small (12V). The built in thermal printer is a nice addition as well, plus you never have to worry about ink running out. If you want a heavy duty battery tester for home-use this is it, but several others--cheaper models-- may be better. This one seems specifically designed for business use.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome battery tester with a built in printer
customer_reviews.text: I buy and sell a lot of vehicles and I always need to test the battery and charging system before it goes back for sale. I went with this unit compared to others because it has a printer built in so I can keep the print out with the records of vehicle. I like that it tells me the cold cranking amps CCA of the battery as well. And when the battery is low is says Charge and Retest. It is a great machine and it does exactly what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie H

customer_reviews.title: Readings not repeatable.  It’s a GOOD /BAD tester with a printer
customer_reviews.text: Item I received was not new. It showed wear from use. Printer was jammed and broken and half if included paper was used up. The unit itself worked fine. It was able to tell good batteries from bad. If that’s all you need that’s fine. If your looking for consistent repeatable readings to diagnose battery life and performance this is NOT YOUR TOOL. It’s main purpose is to make a paper copy of GOOD /NO GOOD battery condition for warranty purposes, this is a cheap way to get that done if you actually receive a new one in operating condition.
customer_reviews.author: John Deere

customer_reviews.title: Does not give "bad cell" reading/print out after 20+ test with known bad batteries.
customer_reviews.text: After 20+ test (some with known bad batteries, testing bad with other shop testers) ive yet to have this thing give me a bad battery result. Ive got plenty of "charge and retest". This is no good for selling a battery, making owning this tester pointless. I really wanted to like this. I love the ease of use, print ability, but at the end of the day customers want to see "bad battery" when your selling them a battery. Cant find a reason to use it, so I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Fontenot

customer_reviews.title: It's the best unit for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Product works every time when I check a battery. Except the printer paper sometimes it does not feed the paper correctly. I had to realigned the paper otherwise it will be jammed in the paper housing. However, it is working very well as what I expected. This is the best unit for the money.
customer_reviews.author: T TRAN

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is accurate
customer_reviews.text: This small device also works well. If you have two or more cars / caravans, then I think the device is worth the price. Many of the facilities provided by this analyzer are very technical and more suitable for professionals. However, even a newbie like me, I find it relatively easy to use. It will reduce some of the heavy burden on your battery, and fundamentally analyze the voltage output to see how the battery is processing. It can also detect faulty batteries. In my opinion, this analyser more than does the job I require of it and does it well.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Overall is good, except the quality of the print test reault
customer_reviews.text: Work like magic, the only thing I’m dislike is the print Copy for battery Test. The result disappeared one day later, I end up writing it down with my pen.
customer_reviews.author: USA

customer_reviews.title: Great product needs improvements
customer_reviews.text: This product from what I’ve seen I overall good. It works and I’ve been able to catch battery issues before they go completely out. My issue is with the printer. I’ve used it once. Since then it doesn’t work correctly. Don’t spend the extra money for the printer portion because it does not last long.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bivens

customer_reviews.title: Printer grinds
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today and returning. Printer grinds gears and jammed on first printer use. I tried resetting the paper several times. Still grinds and jams. If the printer quality is that bad, how can I trust the overall test results to be accurate?
customer_reviews.author: B. Nash

customer_reviews.title: handy tool to have
customer_reviews.text: This tool will test your battery and give you a printout in just a few minutes at the most. I have tested 4 battery's so far, so we'll see how it holds up in the long run. Battery must have a full charge for proper test results.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: i orderd triple a to jump start my car and they told me the battery is too old and i need to change it, i thought it ok because it still working fine after the jump start, now with this machine i can easly test my bettry and not get scam...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So nice to have. AS SEEN ON YOUTUBE
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on Samcrac’s youtube channel. It seemed to work well for him so I picked one up. So far everything looks good. Briefly plugged it in and played around on my truck and it worked and told me what I expected. Good to have for project cars or older cars as they age.
customer_reviews.author: Ersack5142

customer_reviews.title: Give the battery a test
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble charging my batteries with this device you can see and verify what’s the issue . To my surprise my alternator was the issue and it was draining my battery . This little gadget will let you know what’s the problem
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. Most of the time the paper sticks to the part that prints and I have to try printing 2 or 3 times
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sinister

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT LAST LONG
customer_reviews.text: PURCHASED THIS PRODUCT IN NOVEMBER 2019 IT IS 02/25/2020 AND THE ITEM NO LONGER WORKS. I PURCHASED THREE FOR WORK. I AM UPSET BECAUSE WE RELY ON THIS ITEMS TO ENSURE OUR CUSTOMERS BATTERIES ARE WORKING AND DIAGNOSE ISSUES WITH THE CUSTOMERS CARS. IF ITS THE BATTERY THEN ITS NOT ANOTHER PART ON THE VEHICLE. I WOULD GO WITH ANOTHER BRAND AS THIS ONE IS NOT VERY RELIABLE.
customer_reviews.author: Havilah Maples

customer_reviews.title: printing and diagnosis/short test leads
customer_reviews.text: this equipment cannot print alternator and load test diagnosis. secondly the printer constantly jams. As for telling you how much power or life you have left on your battery, this is good. i suggest the red and black test wires be extended to ten feet because of starting system test.
customer_reviews.author: Sister sister

customer_reviews.title: This is the best tool for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with it.It can test 12v&24v cranking and charging system.You can conveniently print the test results.Easy to use and read,operate.It's a great tool for your vehicle.It can used for cars,mini vans,light or heavy duty trucks.This is the best tool for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Tristian Grant

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Machine!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a replacement to my old one that was purchased from local store. This thing is way better. Show you a lot more information and you can even print a report. Showed it to my friend who owns a repair shop and he said this is more professional than the one they are using. Quality stuff. Very happy with the purchase. Shipping was quick too. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: T. Goranov

customer_reviews.title: Product doesnt last long.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. Just doesn't last long. The last one stopped registering the correct battery volts and CCA's when testing 12 volt battery's was showing readings for 24 volt battery's. I fill like it should be replaced but I did not buy the extended warranty on it. The new one we just purchased I did buy the 4 year extended warranty so will see how long it last before I send it back for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but....
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and understand results. Only reason why I didn’t give it 5 stars is that the cables aren’t long enough to reach the cabin of my car.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. lubchansky

customer_reviews.title: good for price
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price and esp with printer. easy to use . only seems to recommend battery replacement early . when other testers state charge and retest. other than that woks great . note gives failed this is needs battery . and stats recommend new battery when not to low . if that is result recommend charge let sit over night and recheck . but very good for price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool . It’s easy to use and the print out feature also gives our customers some piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: flh440

customer_reviews.title: Good Product For The Money!
customer_reviews.text: I like the printer function of the tester. I can't find a thing wrong with the system. I'll keep it! Thanks for asking. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Earthboy57

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, set up correctly and accuracy is very good
customer_reviews.text: It's too early to tell but, I think it will meet all my expectations for what need it to do. I believe has excellent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TSR

customer_reviews.title: No ripple test.
customer_reviews.text: A very basic unit compared to professional units I am used to using. No Ripple test. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: LandofSnowmen

customer_reviews.title: Works for Power Chair Batteries
customer_reviews.text: I work on power chairs and am always struggling with an accurate tester for batteries. This unit has so far functioned very well in testing and printing off the testing information to tell if batteries are good or bad or weak.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I would give five stars if it was able to analyse 6 volts batteries too...

customer_reviews.text: Actually a nicely put together product does a nice job reading the battery, alternator also has the ability to load test batteries.

customer_reviews.text: Not a very useful meter does not do reserve capacity or amp hour the true test of the life of a battery I should return it no setting for agm

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great checking my charging system and battery load. Shows battery voltage no load and under load. Also checks charging with motor running. Well made, good battery connectors.

customer_reviews.title: Ancel Tester
customer_reviews.text: Great starter, battery and charging system tester. Son uses it at Mavis Tire and has sold a few batteries.

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality at all.
customer_reviews.text: Machine has less than acceptable performance. I wish I had been notified of the poor quality and performance of this tool before now so that I could have returned it for a refund.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and works as described
customer_reviews.text: works as described, simple to use. Prints out nice little paper record of condition. Would recommend to anyone who wants a simple printing battery condition tester. Also test the alternator output at the same time.

customer_reviews.title: printer
customer_reviews.text: It could be much better but I guess for the value it's worth it the printer does not function properly all the time you have to press down on it

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I wish I was offered the version with a carry case. It does work compared to my OLD testers... use it on my two AGM batteries.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: This car system Analyzer Scan Tool can use to scaning and charging. It is capable for 12 V cars. There is a books comes with the tool to help we read the scan result. It works well and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very nice works perfect I use it a lot at the shop!!!!

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: This is the first battery tester I bought. I think everyone who loves a car should need it. It can check the health of the battery at any time.I like it very much.

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I actually like the product, but it seems too fragile. I hope it's just my impresison.

customer_reviews.title: The features of the product. The timeliness of delivery. Value for money.
customer_reviews.text: I love the item. It is exactly what I wanted for the purpose that I wanted it for. Thanks guys.

customer_reviews.title: quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived very quickly after ordering works well has been tested against our top brand analyzers and is working just as well only fault is the range only goes to 1700cca not 2000cca as stated meaning the 24v function is limited in use

customer_reviews.text: Good tester for the money! Wish it came with a case though. I do road service and would have been great to have a case for it.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all with the price I paid. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all with the price I paid. Print is unreadable (lines missing sporadically), And it's telling me batteries are ok when they are not. The test time seems very short compared to other types of checkers. The resistance meter was not consistent at all.

customer_reviews.title: Works good but the manufacturer can't spell.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work pretty good. I bought three of them for our large shop. The embarrassing part is when I was demonstrating the operation of the tester was the spelling on the display. during testing, the display reads TESTTING. While printing, the display reads PRINTTING. It does work well, but we will not be using them in front of our customers.

customer_reviews.title: poor design for the paper lid
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased it for our shop. Seems to work properly except for the paper print out - you have to put pressure on the roller side lid - otherwise the paper doesn't advance and everything prints on one line. poor design for the paper lid.

product_meta.title: ANCEL BST500 12V/24V 100-2000 CCA Automotive Battery Load Tester, Car Cranking and Charging System Analyzer Scan Tool with Printer for Heavy Duty Trucks, Cars, Motorcycles and More (Black and Red)
feature_bullets: BST500 battery tester is a more advanced tool with the capability to test automotive, marine, motorcycle, boat and truck batteries. Designed for 12V battery testing, it nevertheless can be used for both 12V and 24V starting and charging systems.

This battery analyzer can test 12V lead-acid batteries, including regular flooded, AGM flat plate, AGM spiral, gel, and deep-cycle batteries. It covers all battery rating Standards such as CCA, BCI, CA, MCA, JIS, DIN, IEC, EN, SAE, GB standards.
It’s fast and accurate, displaying battery parameters in about 2.5 seconds to advise you of a battery’s full/low or charge/replace status.
The unit is housed in a rugged casing for easy hand-holding. It’s lightweight and has a backlit display screen for clear reading under any lighting condition.

Its built-in printer uses standard thermal printer paper, so you can conveniently attach a printout to a work order, share it with your customers or build a preventative maintenance program of record keeping.

specifications.Special Features: 🎄 Clamps features with reverse polarity protection do not emit light, heat or spark, makes this operation very safe, 🎄 Tests 12V&24V cranking and charging system, 🎄 Compatible with Lead-Acid, regular flooded, AGM flat plate, AGM spiral, gel, and deep cycle batteries, 🎄 Quick starter analysis without disabling the ignition, 🎄 Quickly and accurately display the test result in just about 2.5 seconds, 🎄 Multiple vehicle applications - passenger cars, minivans, light or heavy-duty trucks, 🎄 Tests all battery rating systems - CCA, BCI, CA, MCA, JIS, DIN, IEC, EN, SAE, GB, 🎄 Tests the batteries on the car directly- no need to remove the battery
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars248 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
